text: The Lexus UX is a car made by Lexus, Toyota's luxury car brand. It is a small Japanese crossover SUV that was shown to the public in March 2018, at the Geneva Motor Show. It has a bold and stylish design with a small size. 'UX' stands for 'Urban Crossover', as the UX is made for places like smaller areas in cities. ==Details== The UX is sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It started in the U.S in December 2018, started in Thailand in March 2019, Europe in October 2019, and it started in the first 3 months in Australia. There is a gas-powered on called the UX 200, a hybrid called UX 250h, and a fully electric one called UX 300e. Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Lexus UX
